body.p: The Gentoo Weekly Newsletter for this week begins with an announcement of Gentoo being chosen as a finalist for a Product Excellence Award at the 2004 New York LWE, after which we'll tell you about how the two new desktop co-leads, Donnie Berkholz and Brandon Hale were chosen by the management team and by a poll of developers. You'll also find a profile of Brandon in the Featured Developer section, as well as the usual community coverage and a tip on using nl to flexibly number lines in text files. Enjoiy!
